#summary JUnit Generator

= Introduction =

A simple tool to generate JUnit 3.x or 4.x test cases automatically. 



= Details =

{{{
Usage: java -jar jugen.jar <project_dir> <destination_dir> <template_dir> <junit_version> [overwrite]
}}}

In Eclipse, we can run JUGen easily by creating an External Tools Configuration. For example:
{{{
Location: /usr/bin/java
Working Directory: <the_workspace>
Arguments:
-jar 
/home/fredy/jugen/jugen-0.1-beta.jar
/home/fredy/workspace/test-app/src
/home/fredy/workspace/test-app/test 
/home/fredy/jugen/templates 
4
overwrite
}}}
